ViewObject.Name: ReceiptSearchVO
ViewObject.SelectList: AssetDeploymentReceiptHdrEO.ALLOCATION_ID, AssetDeploymentReceiptHdrEO.CONTRACT_ID, AssetDeploymentReceiptHdrEO.CREATED_BY, AssetDeploymentReceiptHdrEO.CREATION_DATE, AssetDeploymentReceiptHdrEO.CUST_SITE_ID, AssetDeploymentReceiptHdrEO.CUSTOMER_ID, AssetDeploymentReceiptHdrEO.CUSTOMER_TYPE, AssetDeploymentReceiptHdrEO.DEPARTMENT_CODE, AssetDeploymentReceiptHdrEO.DEPARTMENT_NAME, AssetDeploymentReceiptHdrEO.DEPT_FLEX_VALUE_ID, AssetDeploymentReceiptHdrEO.DEPT_FLEX_VALUE_SET_ID, AssetDeploymentReceiptHdrEO.DIV_FLEX_VALUE_ID, AssetDeploymentReceiptHdrEO.DIV_FLEX_VALUE_SET_ID, AssetDeploymentReceiptHdrEO.DIVISION, AssetDeploymentReceiptHdrEO.DO_ID, AssetDeploymentReceiptHdrEO.DOCUMENT_DATE, AssetDeploymentReceiptHdrEO.DR_ID, AssetDeploymentReceiptHdrEO.DR_NUMBER, AssetDeploymentReceiptHdrEO.DR_STATUS, AssetDeploymentReceiptHdrEO.LAST_UPDATE_DATE, AssetDeploymentReceiptHdrEO.LAST_UPDATED_BY, AssetDeploymentReceiptHdrEO.MASTER_CONTRACT_ID, AssetDeploymentReceiptHdrEO.OBJECT_VERSION_NUMBER, AssetDeploymentReceiptHdrEO.PREPARED_BY, AssetDeploymentReceiptHdrEO.PROJECT_ID, AssetDeploymentReceiptHdrEO.REMARKS, AssetDeploymentReceiptHdrEO.REQ_BU_ID, AssetDeploymentReceiptHdrEO.SITE_USE_ID, AssetDeploymentReceiptHdrEO.SRC_BU_ID, AssetDeploymentReceiptHdrEO.SRC_DIV_FLEX_VAL_SET_ID, AssetDeploymentReceiptHdrEO.SRC_DIV_FLEX_VALUE_ID, AssetDeploymentReceiptHdrEO.SRC_DIVISION, (select inv.bu_name from xxinv_business_units_t inv where inv.bu_id = AssetDeploymentReceiptHdrEO.SRC_BU_ID) AS TransSourceBU, (select inv.bu_name from xxinv_business_units_t inv where inv.bu_id = AssetDeploymentReceiptHdrEO.REQ_BU_ID) AS TransRequestingBU, (select fv.description from fnd_flex_values_vl fv where fv.flex_value_id = AssetDeploymentReceiptHdrEO.SRC_DIV_FLEX_VALUE_ID) AS TransSourceDivision, (select fv.description from fnd_flex_values_vl fv where fv.flex_value_id = AssetDeploymentReceiptHdrEO.DIV_FLEX_VALUE_ID) AS TransDivision, (select contract_number from XXADS_RENTAL_CONTRACT_T where contract_id=AssetDeploymentReceiptHdrEO.CONTRACT_ID) AS TransContractNumber, (select xlvt.meaning from xxcust_lookup_values_t xlvt where xlvt.lookup_type = 'XXADS_CUSTOMER_TYPES' and xlvt.lookup_code = AssetDeploymentReceiptHdrEO.CUSTOMER_TYPE) AS TransCustomerType, (select xpj.project_number||' - '||xpj.project_name from xxpj_projects_t xpj where xpj.project_id = AssetDeploymentReceiptHdrEO.PROJECT_ID) AS TransProject, (select fv.flex_value||' - '|| fv.description from fnd_flex_values_vl fv where fv.flex_value_id = AssetDeploymentReceiptHdrEO.DEPT_FLEX_VALUE_ID) AS TransDepartment, (select xcdt.customer_name from xxfi_customer_details_t xcdt where xcdt.cust_account_id = AssetDeploymentReceiptHdrEO.CUSTOMER_ID) AS TransCustomerName, (SELECT xcsdt.bill_to_site||' - '||xcsdt.address from xxfi_customer_site_details_t xcsdt where xcsdt.site_use_id = AssetDeploymentReceiptHdrEO.SITE_USE_ID) AS TransCustomerSite, (select xlvt.meaning from xxcust_lookup_values_t xlvt where xlvt.lookup_type = 'XXADS_DEPLOYMENT_RCT_STATUS' and xlvt.lookup_code = AssetDeploymentReceiptHdrEO.DR_STATUS and xlvt.application_id = 13) AS TransStatus
ViewObject.Where: AssetDeploymentReceiptHdrEO.SRC_BU_ID=:p_bu_id and nvl(AssetDeploymentReceiptHdrEO.SRC_DIV_FLEX_VALUE_ID,-2) = NVL(:p_src_div_flex_val_id,nvl(AssetDeploymentReceiptHdrEO.SRC_DIV_FLEX_VALUE_ID,-2)) and nvl(AssetDeploymentReceiptHdrEO.REQ_BU_ID,-3) = nvl(:p_req_bu_id, nvl(AssetDeploymentReceiptHdrEO.REQ_BU_ID,-3)) and AssetDeploymentReceiptHdrEO.CONTRACT_ID=nvl(:p_contract_id,AssetDeploymentReceiptHdrEO.CONTRACT_ID) and nvl(AssetDeploymentReceiptHdrEO.CUSTOMER_TYPE,-4) = nvl(:p_customer_type, nvl(AssetDeploymentReceiptHdrEO.CUSTOMER_TYPE,-4)) and nvl(AssetDeploymentReceiptHdrEO.PROJECT_ID,-1) = nvl(:p_project_id, nvl(AssetDeploymentReceiptHdrEO.PROJECT_ID,-1)) and nvl(AssetDeploymentReceiptHdrEO.DIV_FLEX_VALUE_ID,-1) = nvl(:p_div_flex_val_id, nvl(AssetDeploymentReceiptHdrEO.DIV_FLEX_VALUE_ID,-1)) and nvl(AssetDeploymentReceiptHdrEO.DEPT_FLEX_VALUE_ID,-1) = nvl(:p_dept_flex_val_id, nvl(AssetDeploymentReceiptHdrEO.DEPT_FLEX_VALUE_ID,-1)) and nvl(AssetDeploymentReceiptHdrEO.CUSTOMER_ID,-1) = nvl(:p_customer_id, nvl(AssetDeploymentReceiptHdrEO.CUSTOMER_ID,-1)) and AssetDeploymentReceiptHdrEO.DR_ID=nvl(:p_dr_id,AssetDeploymentReceiptHdrEO.DR_ID) and trunc(AssetDeploymentReceiptHdrEO.DOCUMENT_DATE)=nvl(:p_document_date,trunc(AssetDeploymentReceiptHdrEO.DOCUMENT_DATE)) and exists (select xxads_process_pkg.validate_ads_access(AssetDeploymentReceiptHdrEO.CUSTOMER_TYPE, (case when AssetDeploymentReceiptHdrEO.CUSTOMER_TYPE = 'P' then AssetDeploymentReceiptHdrEO.PROJECT_ID when AssetDeploymentReceiptHdrEO.CUSTOMER_TYPE = 'C' then AssetDeploymentReceiptHdrEO.CUSTOMER_ID when AssetDeploymentReceiptHdrEO.CUSTOMER_TYPE = 'D' then AssetDeploymentReceiptHdrEO.DEPT_FLEX_VALUE_ID when AssetDeploymentReceiptHdrEO.CUSTOMER_TYPE = 'DV' then AssetDeploymentReceiptHdrEO.DIV_FLEX_VALUE_ID else null end), AssetDeploymentReceiptHdrEO.SRC_BU_ID, AssetDeploymentReceiptHdrEO.SRC_DIV_FLEX_VALUE_ID, AssetDeploymentReceiptHdrEO.REQ_BU_ID, :p_user_id) from dual)

ViewAttribute.Name: TransSourceBU
ViewAttribute.Expression: (select inv.bu_name from xxinv_business_units_t inv where inv.bu_id = AssetDeploymentReceiptHdrEO.SRC_BU_ID)

ViewAttribute.Name: TransRequestingBU
ViewAttribute.Expression: (select inv.bu_name from xxinv_business_units_t inv where inv.bu_id = AssetDeploymentReceiptHdrEO.REQ_BU_ID)

ViewAttribute.Name: TransSourceDivision
ViewAttribute.Expression: (select fv.description from fnd_flex_values_vl fv where fv.flex_value_id = AssetDeploymentReceiptHdrEO.SRC_DIV_FLEX_VALUE_ID)

ViewAttribute.Name: TransDivision
ViewAttribute.Expression: (select fv.description from fnd_flex_values_vl fv where fv.flex_value_id = AssetDeploymentReceiptHdrEO.DIV_FLEX_VALUE_ID)

ViewAttribute.Name: TransCustomerType
ViewAttribute.Expression: (select xlvt.meaning from xxcust_lookup_values_t xlvt where xlvt.lookup_type = 'XXADS_CUSTOMER_TYPES' and xlvt.lookup_code = AssetDeploymentReceiptHdrEO.CUSTOMER_TYPE)

ViewAttribute.Name: TransProject
ViewAttribute.Expression: (select xpj.project_number||' - '||xpj.project_name from xxpj_projects_t xpj where xpj.project_id = AssetDeploymentReceiptHdrEO.PROJECT_ID)

ViewAttribute.Name: TransDepartment
ViewAttribute.Expression: (select fv.flex_value||' - '|| fv.description from fnd_flex_values_vl fv where fv.flex_value_id = AssetDeploymentReceiptHdrEO.DEPT_FLEX_VALUE_ID)

ViewAttribute.Name: TransCustomerName
ViewAttribute.Expression: (select xcdt.customer_name from xxfi_customer_details_t xcdt where xcdt.cust_account_id = AssetDeploymentReceiptHdrEO.CUSTOMER_ID)

ViewAttribute.Name: TransCustomerSite
ViewAttribute.Expression: (SELECT xcsdt.bill_to_site||' - '||xcsdt.address from xxfi_customer_site_details_t xcsdt where xcsdt.site_use_id = AssetDeploymentReceiptHdrEO.SITE_USE_ID)

ViewAttribute.Name: TransStatus
ViewAttribute.Expression: (select xlvt.meaning from xxcust_lookup_values_t xlvt where xlvt.lookup_type = 'XXADS_DEPLOYMENT_RCT_STATUS' and xlvt.lookup_code = AssetDeploymentReceiptHdrEO.DR_STATUS and xlvt.application_id = 13)
